name: Central Park
description: A large public park in New York City.

name: Louvre Museum
description: The world's largest art museum in Paris.

name: Tokyo Tower
description: A famous landmark and observation tower in Tokyo.

name: Bondi Beach
description: A popular beach and tourist destination in Sydney.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: An iconic American symbol of freedom in New York.

name: Great Wall of China
description: Ancient series of walls and fortifications in China.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: The iconic iron tower located in Paris.

name: Golden Gate Bridge
description: A famous suspension bridge spanning the Golden Gate in San Francisco.

name: Colosseum
description: Ancient Roman amphitheatre in the center of Rome.

name: Sydney Opera House
description: A multi-venue performing arts centre in Sydney, known for its distinctive architecture.

name: Buckingham Palace
description: The London residence and administrative headquarters of the monarch of the United Kingdom.

name: Christ the Redeemer
description: An Art Deco statue of Jesus Christ in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

name: Machu Picchu
description: 15th-century Inca citadel located in the Eastern Cordillera of southern Peru.

name: Forbidden City
description: Historic palace complex in Beijing that houses collections of Chinese art and artifacts.
